name: Katrina
content: Katrina 我忍不住凝视你的眼眸
而我却找不出对你的溢美之词
I don't know what to say
星期一 我告诉我自己你得等一下我
不要着急 不要心急
I just want a chance to know you
我想有个了解你的机会
To know the woman deep inside
Yeah, to get to know you
Even at the risk of looking like a fool
即便这样让我看起来像个傻子
On Wednesday I casually walk on by
周三我故作随意的走过你身旁
To find that you're not there
I act like I don't care
我装作若无其事的样子
But on Friday I catch a glimpse of you
而周五 无意中看了你一眼
我就告诉自己不要再犹豫
I just want a chance to know you
我想有个了解你的机会
To know the woman deep inside
Yeah to get to know you
Even at the risk of looking like a fool
即便这样让我看起来像个傻子
I just want a chance to know you
我只想有个了解你的机会
To know the love you have inside
Yeah yeah oh no no no no
Yeah to get to know you
Even at the risk of looking like a fool
即便这样让我看起来像个傻子
Katrina will I ever know your heart
Katrina 我是否能明白你的真心？
